name: Groups-related fields should be shown on LDAP page with E20 license

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description:
Groups-related fields should be shown on LDAP page with E20 license
————————————————————————————
  1. As system admin in System Console, add E20 license to a server
  2. Go to LDAP page in System Console
inline.expectedResult:
• Groups-related fields are present:
    • Group Filter
    • Group Display Name Attribute
    • Group ID Attribute

customFields.Related ticket(s): (Story) Remove Groups-related fields from LDAP page with E10 license — MM-21207
customFields.Important notes about this step: CLOUD: Cannot add E20 license -- already defaulted to cloud license
